questions.question: Wat is die name en besonderhede van die slagoffers?
questions.description: Name, ouderdomme, adresse, ander persoonlike inligting.

questions.question: Wat was die misdaad en hoe is dit gepleeg?
Op wattter datum, tyd en plek het die misdaad plaasgevind?
In die geval van 'n sterfte, wat was die amptelike oorsaak?
questions.description: (Volgens paramedici, polisie of ander amptelike bronne.)

questions.question: Wat was die aard van die beserings en watter soort wapen is gebruik?
Wat het aanleiding gegee tot die misdaad en wat is die agtergrond van die slagoffer?
Was daar enige arrestasies en is daar enige verdagtes of leidrade?
Is daar enige vreemde omstandighede wat die misdaad betref?
Kry kommentaar van die slagoffer, getuies, polisie en ander amptelike bronne.
Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
What is the name and details of the victims?
questions.description: Names, ages, addresses, other personal information.

questions.question: What was the crime and how was it committed?
What is the date, time and location of the crime?
In the case of death, what was the official cause?
questions.description: (According to paramedics, police or other official sources.)

questions.question: What injuries did the victims suffer and what weapon was used?
What was the motivation for the crime and what is the background of victim?
Have there been any arrests and are there any suspects or clues?
Are there any strange circumstances surrounding the crime?
Get comment from the victim, witnesses, police and other official sources.
Additional info/notes
Contact details of people you've interviewed
